column2: Kama Sutra
A book with scandalous illustrations. Studying this might make one a better lover.
Spellbook
Brimming with magic, this book contains all the knowledge a mage needs to cast spells.
Custom-made Crown
Your steward assures you that this is not a lazy replica of the Falkyr crown.

[GetLFAmuletDesc]
Amulet of Nondetection
This magically-infused necklace is a favorite of paranoid rulers.
Omelette of Nondetection
This magically-infused breakfast is a favorite of paranoid rulers.
Pirate Booty
Every raider needs a little junk in their trunk.
Elven Quiver
This quiver always seems to replenish any arrows that were loosed.
Orcish Steel Bracers
Like its makers, these braces are strong and unbreaking.
Ring of Protection
A simple ring at first glance, it provides a small, imperceptible bubble of protection around the user.
Lightsaber
This sword is nearly weightless, likely from some magical enchantment.
Luxuria Magic Item
You and your men have stumbled upon a rare treasure while raiding the coastal province!
This will make a fine addition to my collection.
We need the gold more. Sell it.
